CustomField.description: If it is true, then Schedules created by "Adjust Hours Per Day" will respect holidays and create exceptions for them and adjust hours by spreading hours across other days.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If it is true, then Schedules created by "Adjust Hours Per Day" will respect holidays and create exceptions for them and adjust hours by spreading hours across other days.
CustomField.label: Adjust Hours Strategy Respects Holidays
